original_text: Christ did not go into a holy place that people had made on earth. A place like that is only a picture of the true place in heaven. No, Christ went into heaven itself, where God is. Now he is there with God and he speaks to God on our behalf.
korean_text: 그리스도께서는 참 것의 그림자인 손으로 만든 성소에 들어가지 아니하시고 바로 그 하늘에 들어가사 이제 우리를 위하여 하나님 앞에 나타나시고

sentences.original_text: Christ did not go into a holy place
that people had made on earth
A place like that is only a picture
of the true place in heaven
No, Christ went into heaven itself
Now he is there with God
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 하나님과 함께 그곳에 계십니다

sentences.original_text: and he speaks to God on our behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 우리를 대신하여 하나님께 말씀하십니다
